item.title: ✏️ I noticed the hyperlinks in the entries are only visible as plaintext urls. Also there was some issue of duplicate entries appearing and I had to set :RSS_PERMALINK: property to unique value.
item.author: tom@tunkki (Tom Gustafsson)

item.title: ✏️ Connecting the resulting blog to https://micro.blog/ requires just the url kinnala.github.io/blog/index.xml. However, I noticed org-mode titles are interpreted as the actual entries.
item.author: tom@tunkki (Tom Gustafsson)

item.title: ✏️ I wanted to blog from org-mode to https://micro.blog/. First I created https://github.com/kinnala/blog repository. Then I installed https://github.com/emacsmirror/ox-rss. Finally I wrote this entry in index.org, called org-rss-export-to-rss and committed the resulting files.
item.author: tom@tunkki (Tom Gustafsson)
